named-query.name: RELEASABLE_PHYSICAL_SHIPMENTS
named-query.query: SELECT new com.elasticpath.domain.dtos.PhysicalOrderShipmentDTO(pos.uidPk, ord.uidPk, ord.orderNumber, pos.shipmentNumber, ord.storeCode, pos.createdDate) FROM PhysicalOrderShipmentImpl AS pos JOIN pos.orderInternal ord WHERE pos.status = ?1 AND ord.status in (:list) AND EXISTS (SELECT store.code FROM StoreImpl store JOIN store.warehouses w WHERE store.code = ord.storeCode AND w.pickDelay > 0)

named-query.name: UPDATE_SHIPMENTS_WITH_RELEASED_STATUS
named-query.query: UPDATE PhysicalOrderShipmentImpl pos SET pos.status = com.elasticpath.domain.order.OrderShipmentStatus.RELEASED, pos.lastModifiedDate = ?1 WHERE pos.uidPk in (:list)

named-query.name: UPDATE_ORDERS_LAST_MODIFIED_DATE
named-query.query: UPDATE OrderImpl ord SET ord.lastModifiedDate = ?1 WHERE ord.uidPk in (:list)
